title: 03/02/22 DPS Hour 2 Andrew Marchand
itunes:title: 03/02/22 DPS Hour 2 Andrew Marchand
description:
Andrew Marchand talks to Dan about all the broadcaster changes going on with the NFL. Andrew says Al Michaels is still the man and a strong player in the industry.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
